text: Dinosaur Journey Museum, or Museums of Western Colorado’s Dinosaur Journey, is a museum in Fruita in Mesa County, Colorado. ==See also== *Fruita Museum, a predecessor museum building in Fruita, built in 1938-39 as a Works Progress Administration project, listed on the National Register of Historic Places ==References== ==External links== *Museums of Western Colorado Category:Dinosaur museums in the United States Category:Museums in Mesa County, Colorado Category:Fruita, Colorado Category:Natural history museums in Colorado
title: Dinosaur Journey Museum
